title: WCAS CLASSICS 320-0-1 Greek and Roman History

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Over the nine weeks of this course, we shall study the nine books of Herodotus' History of the Persian Wars from contrasting perspectives: historical, literary, ethical, geographical, and also in the cinema (including The 300). All readings in English.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Herodotus' The Histories, Oxford Edition, trans. Waterfield, ISBN: 9780199535668
